00033 package org.argoprint.engine.interpreters;
00034 import java.util.Vector;
00035 
00036 import org.argoprint.ArgoPrintDataSource;
00037 import org.argoprint.engine.Environment;
00038 import org.w3c.dom.Node;
00039 import org.w3c.dom.NodeList;
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * Handles all Nodes that is handed to it. 
00043  */
00044 public class InterpreterDefault extends Interpreter {
00045 
00046     public InterpreterDefault(ArgoPrintDataSource dataSource) {
00047         super("", dataSource);
00048     }
00049 
00050     /**
00051      * Recurses on all the Node's children.
00052      * 
00053      * @param tagNode The Node to process.
00054      * @param env The environment in which to process the children.
00055      */
00056     protected void processTag(Node tagNode, Environment env) throws Exception {
00057         NodeList children = tagNode.getChildNodes();
00058         if (children.getLength() > 0) {
00059             Vector childrenVector = getVector(children);
00060             recurse(childrenVector, env);
00061         }   
00062     }
00063 
00064     protected boolean canHandle(Node tagNode){
00065         return true;
00066     }
00067 }
